GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: Serves an object of the article that belongs to the given article_id

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Serves an array of comments that belong to the given article_id

comments.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.
comments.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Serves a new comment object that belongs to the given article_id

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Serves an object of an updated artice that belongs to the given article_id where vote gets updated by the given input

updatedArticle.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
updatedArticle.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Responds with status 204 and serves no content

GET /api/users.description: Serves an array of all users

GET /api/articles (topic query).description: Serves an array of all the articles filter by a given topic
